text.value: _Refer to a health facility for further malnutrition assessment._
child is already enrolled in malnutrition program
Refer to health facility
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Person to visit health facility alone
Did you refer to the health facility?
Date should be within the last 31 days.

Does have any of the following signs?

Assess child for malnutrition using Mid Upper Arm Circumference (MUAC) assessment
_Refer to a health facility for further malnutrition assessment._
**Due to COVID-19 do not take the MUAC measurement at this time.**
_Remind care giver the importance of giving supplements only to _
What treatment program was enrolled in

**Protect yourself and others from COVID-19. Wash your hands frequently with soap and water, maintain a distance of 2 meters from others, do not touch clients during household visits, and stay home if you are sick and experiencing fever, cough, or shortness of breath.**
_Please advise the parent to take the child to the health facility._
_Please confirm the vaccines information from the child's health passport._
These are visits done since the last time the CHW visited the child
Can only report one Immunization visit for newborns
How many immunization visits would you like to report?
Date cannot be in the past!
When is due for the next immunization?
These are visits done since the last time the CHW visited the child
How many immunization visits would you like to report?
Child had a scheduled visit but they did not attend(missed visit)
Child had no scheduled immunization visit
Child has not started immunization yet
Reasons for not reporting any visit
These are visits done since the last time the CHW visited the child
Would you like to report any immunization visits?
Date cannot be in the future or before the patient's date of birth!
Select the vaccines that were given on
Swelling, redness or pus discharges on the umbilical cord
Abdominal distension and not passing stools
Crying continuously after all effort failed
Skin rash all over the body

Ntchito iyi idzawoneka ku gawo la Zochita paâ€¦..
**_Kufufuza za matenda osiyanasiyana a ana ang'ono_**
_Mutumizeni mwana patsiku lake lokatengera katemera wina._
Ali ndi zizindikiro zoopsa za kunyentchera
_Tumizani mwansanga kuchipatala akakhala ndi zizizndikiro zoopsa!_
_Wonetsetsani kuti mwatumiza tsambali kuti mumalize ntchito iyi_
Kufufuza Matenda Pakati pa Ana Ochepera Zaka Zisanu
Tsiku likhale la mkatikati mwa masiku 31 apitawo
Simungasankhe "Sindikudziwa" ngati mwasankha kale yankho lina
Sankhani matenda onse amene anagonekedwa nawo
Chongani chizindikiro china chili chonse chomwe ali nacho
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Kodi ali ndi zina mwa zizindikiro izi?
Kodi padutsa masiku angati chiyambireni kuona zizindikiro zoopsa
Kufufuza za matenda osiyanasiyana a ana ang'ono
Kodi analowetsedwa kale mu pologalamu ya ana onyenthera
Chongani chizindikiro china chili chonse chomwe ali nacho
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Fufuzani za kunyentchera kwa mwana pogwiritsa ntchito MUAC
Zotsatira zakuyeza MUAC zizikhala pakati pa 5 mpaka 18cm
_Mtumizeni kuchipatala kuti akatsimikize ngati ndi wonyentchera_
**Chifukwa cha matenda a Covid 19, Mukufunsidwa kuti musamuyeze mwana MUAC.**
_Kumbutsani wopereka chisamaliro kufunika kopereka zowonjezera zowonjezera ku _

**Zitetezeni inu komanso anzanu ku matenda a Covid 19. Sambani mmanja kawirikawiri ndi madzi komanso sopo, Khalani motalikirana pafupifupi ma mita awiri, Musakhudzane ndi aliyense pamene mukugwira ntchiton yanu, ndipo mukhale kunyumba ngati mwatentha thupi, kutsokomola komanso kubanika kupuma.**
_Malingani ndi momwe mbiri ya iliri, Kufufuza pa nkhani ya kunyentchera, matenda osiyanasiyana a ana aang'ono, katemera komanso kugonekedwa m'chipatala._
_Kufufuza za matenda osiyanasiyana a ana ang'ono_
_Chonde limbikitsani makolo zopita ndi mwana wawo kuchipatala kukalandira katemera_
_Chonde tsimikizani za ndondomeko ya katemera m'buku la mwana la ku chipatala_
Awa ndi ma ulendo omwe anachitika kuchokera pomwe CHW anayendera mwana
Ulendo usapose umodzi pa mwana uyu
Ndi ma ulendo angati a katemera omwe mukufuna kulembera?*
Awa ndi ma ulendo omwe anachitika kuchokera pomwe CHW anayendera mwana
Katemera isachepere m'modzi komanso isaposere khumi
Ndi ma ulendo angati a katemera omwe mukufuna kulembera?*
Mwana sanapite kuchipatala pa tsiku lake loyikika la katemera
Mwana analibe ulendo woyikika wa katemera
Zifukwa zolepheretsa kupereka lipoti la ulendo wa katemera
Awa ndi ma ulendo omwe anachitika kuchokera pomwe CHW anayendera mwana
Kodi mukufuna kupereka lipoti la ulendo wina uliwonse wa katemera?
Kutupa, kufiira kapena kutuluka mafinya pa mchombo
Kupweteka kwa m'mimba ndi kukanika kuchita chimbuzi
Sikelo ya sabata yachisanu ndi chimodzi
Mwana analibe ulendo woyikika wa katemera
Mwana sanapite kuchipatala pa tsiku lake loyikika la katemera

bind.calculate: if((selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'rota_1') and selected(../vaccines, 'rota_2')) or (selected(../vaccines, 'measles_1') and selected(../vaccines, 'measles_2')), 'Please select a vaccine dose at a time', '')

if((selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'rota_1') and selected(../vaccines, 'rota_2')) or (selected(../vaccines, 'measles_1') and selected(../vaccines, 'measles_2')), 'Chonde sankhani mlingo wa katemera nthawi imodzi', '')

bind.constraint: not((selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'opv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'opv_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'pcv_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_3') and (selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_1') or selected(../vaccines, 'dpt_hepb_hib_2'))) or (selected(../vaccines, 'rota_1') and selected(../vaccines, 'rota_2')) or (selected(../vaccines, 'measles_1') and selected(../vaccines, 'measles_2')))

bind.relevant: number(../../malnutrition_screening/muac) < 12.5 or (not(selected(../../malnutrition_screening/malnutrition_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../malnutrition_screening/malnutrition_signs) >= 1) or (not(selected(../../imci_screening/imci_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../imci_screening/imci_signs) >= 1) or (not(selected(../../pnc_visit_details/fields/danger_signs, 'none') and count-selected(../../pnc_visit_details/fields/danger_signs) >= 1))

number(../../malnutrition_screening/muac) < 12.5 or (not(selected(../../malnutrition_screening/malnutrition_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../malnutrition_screening/malnutrition_signs) >= 1) or (not(selected(../../imci_screening/imci_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../imci_screening/imci_signs) >= 1) or (not(selected(../../pnc_visit_details/fields/danger_signs, 'none') and count-selected(../../pnc_visit_details/fields/danger_signs) >= 1))

itemset.nodeset: instance('vaccines')/root/item[age_limit_lower <= /under_5_screening/patient_age_in_weeks and age_limit_upper > /under_5_screening/patient_age_in_weeks and (bcg_group = /under_5_screening/bcg_group or birth_polio_group = /under_5_screening/birth_polio_group or opv_1_group = /under_5_screening/opv_dose_1_group or opv_2_group = /under_5_screening/opv_dose_2_group or opv_3_group = /under_5_screening/opv_dose_3_group or pcv_1_group = /under_5_screening/pcv_dose_1_group or pcv_2_group = /under_5_screening/pcv_dose_2_group or pcv_3_group = /under_5_screening/pcv_dose_3_group or dpt_hepb_hib_1_group = /under_5_screening/dpt_hepb_hib_dose_1_group or dpt_hepb_hib_2_group = /under_5_screening/dpt_hepb_hib_dose_2_group or dpt_hepb_hib_3_group = /under_5_screening/dpt_hepb_hib_dose_3_group or ipv_group = /under_5_screening/ipv_group or rota_1_group = /under_5_screening/rota_dose_1_group or rota_2_group = /under_5_screening/rota_dose_2_group or vitamin_a_group = /under_5_screening/vitamin_a_group or measles_1_group = /under_5_screening/measles_dose_1_group or measles_2_group = /under_5_screening/measles_dose_2_group )]
